name: vega-label
description: Label layout transform for Vega dataflows.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-label.js -c -m -o build/vega-label.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g vega-dataflow:vega,vega-scale:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-label.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-label.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-label.js build/vega-label.min.js
